P. C. Mahalanobis Birth Centenary Award |footnotes = }} '''Shyamaprasad Mukherjee''', [[The National Academy of Sciences, India|FNASc]], known as '''S. P. Mukherjee''', (born 16 June 1939) is an Indian [[statistician]] and the Centenary Professor of Statistics at the [[University of Calcutta]]. He is currently [[visiting professor]] at [[University of Calcutta]]{{cite web|url=http://www.stat.caluniv.in/fac.asp |title=Department of Statistics, University of Calcutta |publisher=Stat.caluniv.in |date= |accessdate=2012-07-21}} after retiring formally as the Centenary Professor of Statistics in 2004.{{cite news|url=http://www.hindu.com/2000/01/04/stories/0204000m.htm|title=PM presents awards to 21 scientists|date=4 January 2000|publisher=''[[The Hindu]]''|accessdate=21 July 2012}} ==Early life and education== He was born in [[Kidderpore]], [[Kolkata]], India. In 1954 he appeared in his school final (10th grade) examination and was ranked second in the state of West Bengal. He received an [[Master of Science|M.Sc.]] in [[Statistics]] in 1960 and Ph.D. in [[Statistics]] in 1967 from [[University of Calcutta]]. After a short stint of teaching in the Presidency College, Calcutta he joined the University of Calcutta, as a lecturer in Statistics in 1964. ==Academic career== He has done research in Applied Probability, Parametric & Bayesian Estimation, Reliability Analysis, Quality Management, and Operations Research; published more than sixty research papers and review & expository articles; and supervised twenty one Ph. D. students. He was the President of the Operational Research Society of India as well as of the Association of Asian-Pacific Operational Research Societies (APORS).{{cite web|url=http://www.apors.ms.unimelb.edu.au/committee.html |title=Welcome to APORS |publisher=Apors.ms.unimelb.edu.au |date= |accessdate=2012-07-21}} He was also a Vice-President of the [[International Federation of Operational Research Societies]] (IFORS).{{Citation needed|date=July 2013}} He has been the President {{cite web|url=http://www.calcuttastatisticalassociation.org/Program_Nov2011.html |title=Calcutta Statistical Associtaion |publisher=Calcuttastatisticalassociation.org |date= |accessdate=2012-07-21}} of the [[Calcutta Statistical Association]]. He has served as the Chairman of the Committee on Statistical Methods for Quality and Reliability of the Bureau of Indian Standards. He is currently the President of the Indian Association for Productivity, Quality and Reliability (IAPQR) {{cite web|url=http://www.iapqr.org/bearers.html |title=IAPQR, Indian Association for Productivity Quality & Reliability |publisher=Iapqr.org |date= |accessdate=2012-07-21}} as well as the Editor of IAPQR Transactions and is associated with the editorial work of several other journals. ===Areas of research contributions=== * Applied Probability * [[Parametric equation|Parametric]] and [[Bayes estimator|Bayesian]] Estimation * [[Reliability (disambiguation)|Reliability]] * [[Quality Management]] * [[Operations Research]] ===Books authored=== * [http://books.google.com/books?id=J8ssAAAAMAAJ&dq=editions:ISBN9280311018 Graduate Employment and Higher Education in West Bengal] * [http://books.google.com/books?id=p9RUAAAAYAAJ&source=gbs_navlinks_s Frontiers in Probability and Statistics] ===Awards and medals=== * Prof P V Sukhatme Award for Senior Statisticians June 2012{{cite web|url=http://pib.nic.in/newsite/erelease.aspx?relid=85078 |title=Press Information Bureau English Releases |publisher=Pib.nic.in |date= |accessdate=2012-07-21}} * P C Mahalanobis Birth Centenary Award Jan 2000 ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.caluniv.ac.in/academic/chairs.htm List of Prestigious Chairs, University of Calcutta] * [http://www.newkerala.com/news/newsplus/worldnews-44901.html News on National Statistics Day 2012] {{Persondata |NAME= Mukherjee, S.
